 init ()
 Initialization method for the Controller.

Detailed Description

Controller for the Meta section.

Meta refers to all those diagnostic and introspectional functions that allow visit monitoring, traffic shaping etc.

Definition at line 18 of file meta_controller.php.

MetaController::referrers (  ) 

Action method that shows the referrer URLs of the visits.

MetaController::attribute_chooser (  ) 

Action method to get an attribute chooser.

This method is designed to be called as an AJAX update. It provides a select box control to choose a person whom attribute something to.

Definition at line 412 of file meta_controller.php.

References BaseController::render().

MetaController::attribute_visits (  ) 

Action method to attribute a visit to a person.

This method is designed to be called with AJAX, and does not render anything. It assigns a visit object to a person object.
